sentences.en: A feeling of utter helplessness washed over him.
sentences.cn: 一种全然无助的感觉涌上他的心头.

sentences.en: A look of desperate helplessness was mapped on his face.
sentences.cn: 他脸上呈现出一副非常无助的表情.

sentences.en: A sense of complete helplessness had descended upon him.
sentences.cn: 一阵束手无策的感觉袭击了他.

sentences.en: Carrie hung in a quandary, balancing between decision and helplessness.
sentences.cn: 嘉莉正左右为难.想下决心, 又觉得无助.

sentences.en: Her eyes were dilated as if in a kind of swoon of fascination and helplessness.
sentences.cn: 她睁大眼睛,好象沉缅于幻想之中,一切由人摆布.

sentences.en: Her very helplessness seemed to make her so much stronger than he.
sentences.cn: 她即使在毫无办法的情况下,都好像比他更坚强.

sentences.en: It gave him a strange feeling of responsibility and helplessness.
sentences.cn: 这使他产生了一种奇怪的责任感而又无可奈何.

sentences.en: It is because of that very helplessness that I fell bound to go.
sentences.cn: 正是因为这种无可奈何我才感到非走不可.

sentences.en: Jim signaled his helplessness to Mary to leave the party.
sentences.cn: 吉姆无法从宴会脱身时,他向玛丽使了个眼色,表示无可奈何.

sentences.en: Owen was alternately dejected and maddened by the knowledge of his own helplessness.
sentences.cn: 欧文因自己一筹莫展,时而烦闷,时而生气.

sentences.en: She draws an overpowering picture of human helplessness.
sentences.cn: 她描绘了一幅震撼人心的图画、说明人类无可奈何的处境.

sentences.en: The essential ingredient is a nightmarish sense of bewildered helplessness against a vast sinister, impersonal bureaucracy.
sentences.cn: 主要成分是一种面对庞大的,阴险的 、 非人格化的官僚机构而产生的使人迷惘的、无依无靠的梦魇般的感受.

sentences.en: The incident left me with a sense of helplessness.
sentences.cn: 这次事件使我产生一种无能为力,听天由命的感觉.

sentences.en: This feeling of desperation and helplessness was common to most of the refugees.
sentences.cn: 大多数难民都有这种绝望和无助的感觉。

sentences.en: We were both afflicted permanently with a feeling of sad helplessness.
sentences.cn: 我们俩人不断地为一种悲哀无助的感情所困扰.

sentences.en: When we look at the world around us, particularly as portrayed in the media, many of us feel a sense of helplessness at our perceived inability to manifest change.
sentences.cn: 当我们观察我们周围的世界，尤其是像媒体所描述的那个时，我们中的很多人都会有一丝无助，因为我们感到自己无力实现改变。

words.tran_cn: 无能为力；无可奈何状态

phrases.tran_cn: 习得性无助；学习性无力感

trans.tran_cn: 无可奈何状态，无能为力，无助的状态
